item.title: My command
item.dc:creator: @rockh4rd rockh4rd
item.description:
@rockh4rd wrote:

[quote=“Gh0stb4rr4g3, post:4, topic:229016”][quote author=rockh4rd link=topic=301226.msg2417320#msg2417320 date=1220194857]
XD nice command

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("fly") && playerRights >= 2) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 2261; playerSEW = 2261; playerSER = 2261; playerSEA = 2261; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); sendMessage("Fly mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("flyoff") && playerRights >= 2){ sendMessage("Fly mode off"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
^
my command

its like ::god but instead your on a flying carpet XD
[/quote]

WTF ?
He asked how he can add his command that all players can use it 1 time only …
Don’t post your code than o.o … But nice command anyways

Ur command have 4 work because my ::starter command is almost the same.[/quote]

simple mistake i didnt read the post just looked at title and the command

item.title: My command
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Add it to your save methods

Search case 2: and there will be a couple of options, go to the one that makes most sense.

Then, copy and paste the code, and remember to fill in intergartoString (your int)
Scroll down a bit until you see another save method, and add it there

item.title: My command
item.dc:creator: @ramsv94 ramsv94
item.description:
@ramsv94 wrote:

i added a command in my client.java and i wanted it so u can only do it one. But when i added it it works but u can do it every time u log in and out. How do i fix that

        if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rangenoob")) {	
            if (rangenoob == 0) {
                addSkillXP(6599160, 4); 
                sendMessage("free range lvls);
                rangenoob = 1;
                savemoreinfo();
                savechar();
            } else if (rangenoob == 1) {
                sendMessage("Sorry.");
                PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
                        + " Is a noob and is trying to get a extra lvls!! :p");

            }
        }

Read full topic
